name: Vampire Cabin
description:
Vampire cabin  is a short horror experience designed to give the player the feeling of being in an abandoned cabin filled with monsters.

You could likely run it at other resolutions, but it is strongly encouraged that you use 1920x1080.

Made for the "lux jam" and published on 08/03/2020

The source can be found here: https://github.com/CiaranRowles/VampireCabin
